Official: Forage Sense - Verb Update

3
Alastir
Saturday, August 5th, 2017, 5:48:28 PM

FORAGE SENSE has been added to the FORAGE verb. It will allow players who have at least 25 ranks of survival to ascertain what herbs exist in the immediate area. Please type FORAGE for usage information.

-KEIOS

Keios is pretty amazing. ~Wyrom
